name: admin.conversations.linkGroup
desc: Add an allowlist of IDP groups for accessing a channel

channel_id.desc: The channel to link this group to.

group_id.desc: The IDP Group ID to be an allowlist for the private channel.

team_id.desc: The workspace where the IDP Group and channel exist.
